txt.en: Campanula Chubb would like to thank you for your continued participation in the Farmers Faire Festival.
'You've celebrated for five whole days?! Wow, I'm impressed!\n\n'Here, have a little reward I set aside just for you!'
'There are many rewards that await those who participate in the Farmers Faire, and for those that celebrate for many days, the rewards are all the grander!'
Every year the Farmers Faire Festival takes place to celebrate the long days and bounty of the warm weather. Partake in the festivities to help spread the good-cheer!
Every day there is something to do during the Farmers Faire.  Come and join everyone and participate in many Farmers Faire activities for five days!
